Name: Ignored papers that:
- Discuss non-image captioning (videos, charts, etc.)
- Used metrics on non-English data
I ignored metrics that only appear in the appendix
I only considered papers that conducted an experiment on image captioning
I ignored metrics that use/evaluate anything other than the caption and image (e.g., the location of grounding objects as in F1all and F1 loc from the paper "Grounded video description.")
